website_summaries.verdict: You'd be hard-pressed to find a more sturdy and reliable dip stand that offers a variety of workout options for various body types.
pros: Professional-grade with durable steel frame and oversize hand grips
A comfortable choice thanks to its thick back and seat pad
cons: The instructions are largely visual, which can make setup confusing

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, but buy different grip tape!
customer_reviews.text: Very well made with only one problem: The glue on the grip paper made a STICKY MESS all over the inside of the package. Apparently it has not been heat tested, because the glue MELTED and ran like water. (The tape is absolute cheap garbage compared to the actual equipment, but if something is going to be cheaply made, be glad it was only the tape.) I ended up buying a roll of grip tape from Amazon and using that instead. Looks and works perfectly. The equipment itself is very well made, and not terribly difficult to get perfectly level. It took me three tries to get it perfect, but hey, I'm a perfectionist.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small frame....
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad that I purchased this item. I almost didn't because of other reviews and me thinking that it would be to big for my small frame, which is an issue I have with smaller gyms. I am 5'3" and about 124 lbs. This fits me perfectly and I honestly wouldn't change anything about it. I've owned it for several months now too. This is definitely gym quality as well. Also it supporting down my back and bottom is key. This is the total package.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: The assembly was very easy and that's why I gave it 2 stars
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this item because I wanted to add "dips" to my workout - and thought I'd order this item even though it was one of the most expensive dip stations on Amazon. The assembly was very easy and that's why I gave it 2 stars. When I do "dips" the whole unit "wobbles" and I've even tried adding the little "felt" pads to the bottom to cushion the unit. So when doing DIPS you kind of have to "balance the entire unit" - which in actuality may be a "Core Benefit"... DO NOT SPEND $360 ON THIS UNIT - NOT WORTH IT.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Heinritz

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Equipment
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived soon after I placed the order with VM Innovations (Amazon Marketplace) . As the name indicates, this apparatus is solid and heavy. Other reviewers suggested that two people put this together and I second that. All in all, very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: GracieCat94

customer_reviews.title: Good overall
customer_reviews.text: This is for a hotel fitness center, so it sees relatively heavy use compared to a home machine. For residential use I would rate 5 star. For a professional product, the build quality is acceptable - it holds up to heavy use, though it shows some wear after 6+ months - most notable the grip surface on the entry steps peeled off when the adhesive failed. That can be replaced however. For the price, you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: N. J. Steere

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding, solid, great value
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding. Goes together easily if you follow the instructions. Solid. Small footprint. Great value. I use it to stretch my back (just hang from the armrests) as well as VKR.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Reid

customer_reviews.title: This product is great for a home gym setup
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for a home gym setup. It allows you to add knee raises and two arm dips in my workout routine.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Well made, but a little pricey.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for a few months and it is holding up well. I am no lightweight, and this thing does not flex or bend. It is rock solid. I would have liked the arm rests to be a little less spread apart (at the rear), but if they were closer in the front, they would be too close for dips. A good piece of heavy gauge steel, but could have been a little more reasonable in price. I would have given it 5 stars if it were a bit less expensive. PS it is easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: AJC

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Easy assembly and it is sturdy and does everything it claims. I wish it had a pull-up bar, but I bought it knowing that it doesn't, so no stars lost. I've really been enjoying owning this.
customer_reviews.author: Chadwick

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived yesterday- took 30-45 minutes to put together - no help required, very easy to assemble. This is a sturdy piece of equipment, I am very pleased with the quality of the product - this is commercial gym quality for the home.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy V.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth this amount of money for this equipment
customer_reviews.text: The package arrived on time and works fine, but seems an open box item. some parts had scratch, some dirty on the parts. it's not I expected as a new equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Liang Zhou

customer_reviews.title: Seriously great product
customer_reviews.text: I assembled this myself on my bed and relieved how easy it was . Don't be scared by the instruction page ( too brief } . The product was very sturdy and comfortable ; the arm pads are just the right distance apart , the grips , back pad are all gym quality . Best major gym piece i ever bought .
customer_reviews.author: david oconnor

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, comfortable to use. Its better than the one at my gym. I had help putting it together. If you are mechanically inclined you are good to go.
customer_reviews.author: barb

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Purchase
customer_reviews.text: You can;t go wrong with this company, at least we haven't so far. Easy to assemble and very solid. Excellent purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Pescatore

customer_reviews.title: This thing is absolutely SOLID
customer_reviews.text: Liked everything about it, works well in low ceiling room (86" and I'm 6'1"). Price could be cheaper but it's definitely built to last
customer_reviews.author: brad gulledge

customer_reviews.title: Solid dip station made in the USA
customer_reviews.text: I love being able to do weighted dips and weighted vertical leg-hip raises at home!! It was easy to put together and every part fit together nicely. It feels heavy-duty without actually being too heavy. I'm 5'8 and the width of the bars was great for me (not that height is always a good indicator of shoulder width, but I thought I'd include that info!)
customer_reviews.author: C. Rendeux

customer_reviews.title: Overall I like this piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: Overall I like this piece of equipment. Very sturdy and nice appearance. Grips are well positioned and solid. Easy to assemble. The step assist bars are not out far enough in my opinion, which makes getting up to do dips slightly difficult. Packaging was poor for this heavy of equipment. I would still recommend this though.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Knee raise tower
customer_reviews.text: A very solid knee raise tower. Goes together well, with all parts fitting as they should. If you can use a knee raise (captain's chair) tower, this one is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Walter R. Sereth

customer_reviews.title: VKR Review
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a stand alone VKR Station without the additional Pull-up or Push-up hardware. The Body Solid VKR Station takes up very little space in my small home gym. It was easy to assemble and is rock solid compared to the Combo VKR's I checked out at the local sporting goods super stores. I am very pleased with my Body Solid VKR and would recommend it to anybody looking for a compact, solid, gym quality piece of equipment.
customer_reviews.author: M. Cornejo

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty construction
customer_reviews.text: I use this daily. It is really well made, more like a commercial unit than something intended for home use. I am only 5' 8" tall so it is quite a reach from the back to the hand grips and I have a tendency to slide down. I like it, though.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Wallert

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Very well built piece of hardware. Does just what it supposed to do. Good price for this level of equipment. Product is stable when doing dips or knee lifts. Very easy to put together. Overall I'm very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Compact, Well Made, Solid Dip Station
customer_reviews.text: Great for a small area. If you're installing on carpet, you'll want to bolt it to the surface below the carpet/padding as it will tend to bounce. Very solid once we bolted it down. Well made, doesn't flex. Excellent value!
customer_reviews.author: B. Junker

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Piece of Equipment
customer_reviews.text: In searching for a vertical knee raise station, the Body Solid GVKR60 was the best item out there for the price. It is very solid and does not rock when it is used. Although it costs a decent amount more than the typical power tower a sports store, the quality is much better in my opinion, and for average home use the cost of the commercial gym equipment was not worth it. The padding is firm and supportive. They even provide touch up paint!
customer_reviews.author: Vin

customer_reviews.title: my favorite piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: This machine is heavy duty, sturdy and of very high quality. I bought this for cross training with running and couldn't have made a better decision. Absolutely love it!!
customer_reviews.author: RO460

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived early and was very easy to assemble. Great quality product and very sturdy! A+ all the way.
customer_reviews.author: Jurey

customer_reviews.title: Strong
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, good quality piece of equipment. A very good brand, Will last a long time. Thank you very much.
customer_reviews.author: toyaluvjah1

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Knee Raise Station
customer_reviews.text: This is a great Knee Raise Station. It's easy to put together, it's sturdy, and it has solid/stable feel to it like the ones used at the public gyms. I use mine on a daily basis, and I'm very happy it.
customer_reviews.author: Asbestos Eater

customer_reviews.title: I am getting a six pack and I am not going to the liquor store!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful addition to my home gym. The product is very well made and easy to assemble. My only design suggestion is that the hand grips should be a little longer to accommodate users with larger hands. I am so impressed with the Body Solid product that I have already ordered another piece of equipment (the Dip Station - GDIP59).
customer_reviews.author: Randy Baker

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. I'm very happy with this product. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: pretty good
customer_reviews.text: pretty good product. Only issue is that if you do knee raises a little too fast or powerfully, the whole unit wobbles a little bit. But for the most part, a fairly sturdy and good piece of equipment. I will recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Rikki

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, no missing parts, sturdy, ergonomic to use. A great value for a quality product. Took no more than 20 minutes to assemble and used it right away.
customer_reviews.author: Babsandmark

customer_reviews.title: Better than I thought- very helpful in my training.
customer_reviews.text: Strong exercise equipment. No problem with quality-good stuff. Delivery to my door. Easy assembly. Ready to use in 20 minutes. I do love it.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: good equipment
customer_reviews.text: good equipment does what i need for it to do, very well made and stable for doing dips and anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Very well built. I'm 6-4 and this works well for me. Unfortunately I seem to have a sterno-clavicular joint issue and this type of exercise can be problematic.
customer_reviews.author: D. Miller DDS

customer_reviews.title: SOLID AS A ROCK
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy doing my exercises on the Body Solid GVKR60. I do dips, leg raises and modified pull ups. This machine does not tilt, wobble or feel weak. It is a SOLID piece of equipment. You can concentrate on doing your exercise without worrying about the machine holding your body weight. WORTH THE INVESTMENT FINANCIALLY, PHYSICALLY AND MENTALLY!!!
customer_reviews.author: egghead

customer_reviews.title: Just right!
customer_reviews.text: Well built product to be use in a commercial fitness center with wide use. Essy to set up with just one person in about half hour.
customer_reviews.author: D. Albert

customer_reviews.title: Body Solid
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! It was easy to assemble and it can easily support my 210lb. frame. I would recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: William E. Swegan Jr.

customer_reviews.title: The construction is durable. The only problem was the ...
customer_reviews.text: The construction is durable. The only problem was the bolt holes did not match up so assembly was much more difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Rock solid - Good value
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty, very solid piece of equipment for the price. Feels secure in use--without the disconcerting flex one often experiences when using home-grade fitness equipment.
customer_reviews.author: You Tell Raphael

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, sturdy and doesn't take up too much room.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Willingham

product_meta.title: Body-Solid GVKR60 Vertical Knee Raise with Dip Station for Abdominal and Core Training, Home and Commercial Gym
product_meta.description: Designed to provide an intense ab workout while eliminating strain on the lower back, the Vertical Knee Raise Machine is hard to beat for vacuuming the waistline. Easy and convenient step entry makes getting started a breeze. Thick, comfortable Durafirm back pads and arm supports reduce fatigue and discomfort allowing you keep working on your abs and obliques. Features dip station handles with oversized handgrips for a killer triceps, deltoid, and lower pec workout. Rock solid support and stability is delivered via heavy-gauge steel frames with all-4-side welded construction.
feature_bullets: DESIGN: Provide an intense ab workout while eliminating strain on the lower back
FEATURES: Dip Station handles have oversized handgrips
QUALITY CONSTRUCTION: Heavy-gauge steel frames with all-4-side welded construction
COMFORTABLE: Durafirm back pads and arm supports reduce fatigue and discomfort
DIMENSIONS: 37 in x 27 in x 60 in (L x W x H)

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
